Message:
“Hey, you!
Help me out a little, will ya?”

“Huh? Me?!
Um, but I can’t do any tricks...!”

“Don’t worry,
anybody can do it!
All you gotta do is
throw me a ball, see?”

The gunslinger passed me
the ball in question,
then stepped back a little.

Urgh...
I’m not so sure I can do this...

When I threw the ball,
it ended up hurtlin’
right towards the crowd...

But, the very next moment,
the girl spun through the air,
and shot the ball
clean through the middle.

Her bullseye sent a shower of
colored confetti down on
the heads of the onlookers...

Then, a round of applause
an’ laughter rang out.

“Nice work!
Thanks to you,
that trick was a huge success!”
